name: nimpool.io
description: nimpool.io - Nimiq Pool Mining Done Right. Secure. Distributed. Non-profit.

name: nimiq.watch
description: Mine as part of the nimiq.watch mining pool and get shares of the mined block rewards according to your hash rate.
payouts: Automatic payout once a day at 8am UTC

name: BlankPool
description: BlankPool is a pool ran by Chugwig that uses an adaptive pool fee.

name: AceMining
description: AceMining is a pool ran by community member Maestro that distributes rewards on a pay-per-last-N-shares (PPLNS) basis and provides optimized mining clients for CPUs and GPUs for download on their website.
payouts: Automatic payouts every hour for balances of at least 1 NIM
